item.dc:creator: Zaki Hanafiah
item.content:encoded:
Hello all, first post here. Recently bought this domain so I thought I should make good use of it.

I don’t really make use of blogs or social media like most people do, I like sharing stuff that I think would invoke thought and discussion.

I also like to share experiences or things that can be considered helpful to others in general. Be it about the stuff I’m learning, stuff I’m working on or just random hobbies I usually take up once in a while.

Most of the stuff you’ll see on this page would be tech oriented, so excuse the amount of jargon if you spot any. Hope that readers (if any) enjoy and find something they like from my musings.
